Class WindowMatcher

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.polygonmatch.WindowMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureMatcher
public class WindowMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureMatcher

Quickly filters out shapes that lie outside a given distance from the feature's envelope.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a WindowMatcher, with no envelope buffering.

          Creates a new WindowMatcher, with envelope buffering.

Constructor Detail

WindowMatcher

public WindowMatcher(double buffer)
Creates a new WindowMatcher, with envelope buffering.
Parameters:
buffer - for each feature, the window will be the envelope extended on each side by this amount

Creates a WindowMatcher, with no envelope buffering.

match

public Matches match(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature target,
                     com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.FeatureCollection candidates)
Quickly filters out shapes that lie outside a given distance from the feature's envelope.
Specified by:
match in interface FeatureMatcher
Parameters:
target - the feature to match
candidates - the features to search for matches
Returns:
the candidates with envelopes intersecting the window. Each will have a score of 1.
